argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cvsdiv.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | cvsdiv.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 |  | #P_id | |- ( W e. CVec -> W e. CVec ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_cvsclm | |- ( W e. CVec -> W e. CMod ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_clm0 | |- ( W e. CMod -> 0 = ( 0g ` F ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. CVec -> 0 = ( 0g ` F ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_sneqd | |- ( W e. CVec -> { 0 } = { ( 0g ` F ) } ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_difeq2d | |- ( W e. CVec -> ( K \ { 0 } ) = ( K \ { ( 0g ` F ) } ) ) |
| 9 | 3 | #P_cvslvec | |- ( W e. CVec -> W e. LVec ) |
| 10 | 1 | #P_lvecdrng | |- ( W e. LVec -> F e. DivRing ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` F ) = ( Unit ` F ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` F ) = ( 0g ` F ) |
| 13 | 2, 11, 12 | #P_isdrng | |- ( F e. DivRing <-> ( F e. Ring /\ ( Unit ` F ) = ( K \ { ( 0g ` F ) } ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_simprbi | |- ( F e. DivRing -> ( Unit ` F ) = ( K \ { ( 0g ` F ) } ) ) |
| 15 | 9, 10, 14 | #P_3syl | |- ( W e. CVec -> ( Unit ` F ) = ( K \ { ( 0g ` F ) } ) ) |
| 16 | 8, 15 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( W e. CVec -> ( K \ { 0 } ) = ( Unit ` F ) ) |
